14489.name: Vesper Shaper {PvP} - Haste
14489.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. During an attack, it has a chance of canceling a target's enhanced status by more than 1, or to decrease a target's Shield Defence. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14490.name: Vesper Fighter {PvP} - Focus
14490.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 123. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. During an attack, it has a chance of canceling a target's enhanced status by more than 1, or to decrease a target's Shield Defence. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14491.name: Vesper Fighter {PvP} - Health
14491.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14492.name: Vesper Fighter {PvP} - Critical Stun
14492.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. There is about 43% chance of afflicting Stun during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP, during an attack, cancels a target's enhanced status by more than 1 occasionally, or decreases a target's Shield Defence. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14493.name: Vesper Stormer {PvP} - Health
14493.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14494.name: Vesper Stormer {PvP} - Guidance
14494.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 75 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14495.name: Vesper Stormer {PvP} - Haste
14495.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14496.name: Vesper Avenger {PvP} - HP Drain
14496.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Restores 4% of melee damage inflicted upon the enemy to your own HP. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14497.name: Vesper Avenger {PvP} - Health
14497.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max HP increases by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14498.name: Vesper Avenger {PvP} - HP Regeneration
14498.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases HP Recovery Rate. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14499.name: Vesper Retributer {PvP} - HP Regeneration
14499.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases HP Recovery Rate. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage
